column4: can I run a kind of ubuntu linux on a Pentium I with 800 MB hard drive, 32 mb ram? I basically need open office, mp3 playing????
openoffice with 32 megs of ram! .... aint gonna happen
plus you dont have enough hd space either
or a kind of office that is capable for opening and making doc formats but on the other hand it is not too old
well ok try this.... do a ubuntu server install (so it just installs the base system) then apt-get xorg and fluxbox... then use abiword
try damn small linux or puppy linux too
I think damn small linux is your best bet
www.damnsmalllinux.org
its a very cool up to date OS that is designed for harware like yours
It does not have anything. I need a bigger distro of 400 mb
it has a package manager to get what you need
Ok I will try it
what apps do you nead?
I need an office suite, abiword or somthing, mp3 playing and that is enough, maybe a krusader
Or a midnight commander
all that will be very easy to get with Damn small
I hope that I can boot it with floppy disk
not sure. ... but probably
but this does not uses gnome right?
gnome would never run on that hardware
it uses fluxbox   which seems weird at first but is very cool... and looks good too
ok I understand. Is there other small distros which you know?
puppy linux is good...
http://www.goosee.com/puppy/
puppy or damn small? decide
thats up to you... puppy is a little bigger comes with a desktop that resembles windows
but damn small has a bigger community and more packages (i think)
I decided at damn small cause it has an eye catchy design
thats the one I would use
are you familiar with apt-get?
Anyway I don't use net connection at it. If it is a debian distro than I will transfer my packages to cd. I can install a program in ubuntu with sudo dpkg -i packagename
this will work in this small distro?
yes... damn small comes with abiword and xmms i think.. so you may not have to do much
ok I am downloading it
help me I don't know what to download cause there are a lot of things at mirror pages
ok hold on
I mean a lot of damn small versions
you want current.iso
I hope that I can format with it my windows 98 drive
what do you mean?
I have windows 98 installed on this old computer and I want to format my hard drive, it will be possible through the dsl setup?
yes very easily
wait... you said you didnt have a cdrom drive on that comp?
I have cd rom drive
I have a 48x cd-rom drive
on the old machine?
yes
but its not bootable?
no the bios does not lets to boot, but I can boot dsl with floppy too, there are bootfloppydisks too
sweet
this old pc is enough for office work and for mp3 listening, and for image viewing
should be fine
cant put too many mp3's on an 800 meg drive though :)
anyway I use an AMD DURON 1.8 with 256 ram, 40 gb hard drive but I am dreaming on a MACHINTOSH
no you can not
:)))) But now windows uses with office 80 percent of the hard drive
yes I have seen :))))
now I am in windows and here does not work the tab way
What kind of floppy boot disk image should I donwload?
what kinds are there?
what program?
I can not use the nick auto completing, I have to write your name every time manually
that sucks
A slide show creator, that creates beautifull slideshows from pictures with music and so on that I can write in dvd and especially in vcd or svcd
you can do that in linux : )
how the hell?. I have been looking for a program for two weeks without success
and I need a picture retouching program too
is not so professional like corel draw and arcsoft programs
anyway it is not easy to use
sounds like your stuck in 1998
Corel Graphic Suite is a very professional graphic suite
so a slideshow creator?
what?
that slideshow creator programme for linux, and a powerfull picture editing tool
gimp and oo2
don't say to me that I can make with oo impress dvd and vcd presentations with sounds to watch in tv
well you make the movies then encode them to dvd or vcd
but they will become low quality presentations
why would you think that
don't say to me that I can convert those really good presentations to vcd and play in a dvd player and watch on tv
ive told you ten times that you can
ive done it myself
I am happier than ever
After downloading dsl I will go to linux and I will try it
can I get that converting tool in repos
i dont know if it is in the dsl repo... but its out there.. where there is a will there is a way.. I dont have time to go into detail ... but search the web
but you have the tool don't you?
i do yes
than you simply give me it's name
its a little more complicated than that
read up on vcdimager and tovid
alsao dvdauthor
oo2 has suppourt to wirte it to a movie file... but im not sure what type the result is

it can not expot or save as into any video format neither avi, nor vcd or anything

what kind of floppy boot-image should I download
